channel.title: Training non-combat skills on RichScape [How to?]
channel.description:
Title says it all i've found how to train some skills like wc mining fm thiv crafting and flech but i cant figure out how to train other non-combar skills like slayer farming herblore and others please help.
If you know atleast where to start training some skill like slayer please tell me the location. Thanks to who ever helps me
